price: 78. Markuu arkay qorraxda oo soo baxaysa, wuxuu yidhi: Ma kan baa Rabbigay? Ma kan baa ugu weyn?. Markay se dhacday, wuxuu yidhi: Qoonkaygiyow! Anigu waxaan barii ka ahay waxaad Alle u shariig yeeshaan.
arabic: فَلَمَّا رَءَا ٱلشَّمۡسَ بَازِغَةٗ قَالَ هَٰذَا رَبِّي هَٰذَآ أَكۡبَرُۖ فَلَمَّآ أَفَلَتۡ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falammā raā al-shamsa bāzighatan qāla hādhā rabbī hādhā akbaru falammā afalat qāla yāqawmi innī barīon mimmā tush'rikūna
